name: api-lambda-crud-dynamodb
description: Running an API Gateway with four Lambdas to do CRUD operations on DynamoDB

scripts.deploy: cross-env BUILD_ENV=production npm run cdk synth
scripts.dev:api: npm run cdk synth && sam local start-api -t ./cdk.out/springfieldMeetupApi.template.json --docker-network sparkling-tom-cats_default
scripts.dev:api-logging: npm run cdk synth && sam local start-api -t ./cdk.out/springfieldMeetupApi.template.json --docker-network sparkling-tom-cats_default --log-file api-logs.txt
scripts.dev:importer: npm run cdk synth && sam local invoke -t ./cdk.out/springfieldMeetupApi.template.json importerFunction
scripts.dev:sync-dynamodb: npm run cdk synth && node scripts/sync-dynamodb.js
